verses.kjv: Save me, O God, by thy name, and judge me by thy strength.
verses.ct: Rescue me, God, by the power of your name, and defend my cause with your strength.

verses.kjv: Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.
verses.ct: Listen to my prayer, God; pay attention to what I'm saying.

verses.kjv: For strangers are risen up against me, and oppressors seek after my soul: they have not set God before them. Selah.
verses.ct: Ruthless strangers have turned against me, and violent people are trying to take my life — people who have no regard for God. Selah.

verses.kjv: Behold, God is mine helper: the Lord is with them that uphold my soul.
verses.ct: Look — God is the one who helps me; the Lord stands with those who support my life.

verses.kjv: He shall reward evil unto mine enemies: cut them off in thy truth.
verses.ct: He will turn their own evil back on my enemies. Destroy them because of your faithfulness.

verses.kjv: I will freely sacrifice unto thee: I will praise thy name, O LORD; for it is good.
verses.ct: I will bring you a willing offering; I will praise your name, LORD, because it is good.

verses.kjv: For he hath delivered me out of all trouble: and mine eye hath seen his desire upon mine enemies.
verses.ct: He has rescued me from every trouble, and I have seen him triumph over my enemies.
